abstract: An adviser to China’s immense state pension fund is planning to return to the world of hedge funds by starting up JT Capital Management, a China-focused fund, Bloomberg News reported.
snippet: An adviser to China’s immense state pension fund is planning to return to the world of hedge funds by starting up JT Capital Management, a China-focused fund, Bloomberg News reported.
lead_paragraph: An adviser to China’s immense state pension fund is planning to return to the world of hedge funds by starting up JT Capital Management, a China-focused fund, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.

headline.main: Adviser to China Pension Fund to Start Hedge Fund
